item.title: OpenAI 发布 Sora 2：AI 视频进入「GPT-3.5 时刻」
item.guid: OpenAI-发布-Sora-2：AI-视频进入「GPT-3.5-时刻」
item.description:
Today, OpenAI officially released the new generation AI video generation model Sora 2, and simultaneously launched the Sora application for C-end users. OpenAI 今日正式发布全新一代 AI 视频生成模型 Sora 2，并同步上线面向 C 端用户的应用 Sora。

Officials call this the "GPT-3.5 moment" for AI video generation, marking the technology's transition from the demonstration phase to large-scale application. 官方称这是 AI 视频生成的「GPT-3.5 时刻」，标志着技术从演示阶段迈入大规模应用阶段。

Sora 2 Core Upgrades: Sora 2 核心升级：

    First time achieving synchronized audio and video generation, capable of simultaneously generating visuals with matching ambient sounds, interactive sounds, and dialogue.

    Physical accuracy significantly improved, actions and fluid effects are more consistent with real-world dynamics

    Image resolution and detail realism enhanced, with more flexible style control capabilities

    Instruction consistency improved, with stronger controllability over complex scenes across shots

Sora App Highlight Features: Sora App 亮点功能：

    「Cameo」: Users can seamlessly integrate their own image and voice into AI-generated scenes

    「Remix」: Supports secondary creation or remixing of other people's videos to co-generate content

    All videos in the feed are AI-generated; users can directly modify prompts or add their own image

Currently, the Sora App has launched first in the US and Canada, supporting iOS and web versions, using an invitation code mechanism. Sora 2 is initially free to access, and ChatGPT Pro users can get priority experience with the higher-quality Sora 2 Pro model. OpenAI also plans to release an API for developers to use. 目前，Sora App 已在美国、加拿大首发，支持 iOS 与网页版，采用邀请码机制。Sora 2 初期免费开放，ChatGPT Pro 用户可优先体验更高质量的 Sora 2 Pro 模型，OpenAI 还计划推出 API 供开发者使用。

item.title: 罗永浩谈小米「小字」争议：各家都这样
item.guid: 罗永浩谈小米「小字」争议：各家都这样
item.description:
Recently, Luo Yonghao discussed online criticisms regarding the small text in the bottom right corner of Xiaomi's "King of Backlight" poster during a livestream. 近日，罗永浩在直播中谈及网络上针对小米「逆光之王」海报中右下角小字的质疑。

He stated that the widely discussed practice is not unique to Xiaomi but rather a "bad habit" of the entire mobile phone industry, with various manufacturers adopting similar methods for a long time. 他表示，外界热议的相关做法并非小米独创，而是整个手机行业的「陋习」，各家厂商长期以来都在采用类似方式。

Luo Yonghao pointed out during the livestream: "Many people have been criticizing Xiaomi for this recently, but it's actually an industry bad habit; every company does it. It's not unique to Xiaomi. The mobile phone industry has always done this, if you don't believe me, go check it yourselves." 罗永浩在直播中指出：「这两天很多人在拿这个黑小米，其实这个是行业陋习，各家都这么做。并不是小米独创的。手机行业其实也一直都这么搞，不信你们自己去查一下。」

He frankly stated, "It's not to say that doing this is right," but it's unfair for public opinion to focus the issue solely on Xiaomi. 他直言「并不是说这样做对」，但舆论将问题集中到小米身上并不公平。

A few days ago, Wan Zhiqiang, CMO of Xingji Meizu Group, also posted on Weibo to express his stance on this issue. 日前，星纪魅族集团 CMO 万志强也就此问题在微博发文表态。

He stated that companies add disclaimers in product promotions primarily to comply with regulatory requirements. 他表示，企业在产品宣传中加入备注说明，主要是为了遵循法规要求。

In fact, it's all to comply with regulations, and each company will have some disclaimers. However, Meizu internally emphasized at the time that, while preserving the contextual meaning, supplementary qualifiers should be written as clearly as possible to avoid misleading people, as product philosophy includes values.

That afternoon, Luo Yonghao replied to netizens on Weibo, stating that he hoped this incident would lead the industry to eliminate "misleading small print," but that "non-misleading small or large print is sometimes still necessary." 当天下午，罗永浩在微博回复网友，表示希望经过本次事件，行业能够消灭「误导性的小字」，但「没有误导性的大小字，有时候还是必要的」。

item.title: Galaxy Ring 电池鼓包取不下来，受害者：再也不戴智能戒指了
item.guid: Galaxy-Ring-电池鼓包取不下来，受害者：再也不戴智能戒指了
item.description:
Yesterday, overseas tech blogger Daniel (@ZONEofTECH) posted on X, stating that the Samsung Galaxy Ring he was wearing experienced battery swelling before boarding, causing the ring to get stuck on his finger and unable to be removed. 昨天，海外科技博主 Daniel（@ZONEofTECH）在 X 发帖，称其佩戴的三星 Galaxy Ring 在准备登机前出现电池鼓胀情况，导致戒指卡在手指上无法取下。

Due to the emergency, he was taken to the hospital for treatment, and the ring was finally removed with the help of ice packs and medical lubricant. 由于情况紧急，他被送往医院处理，最终通过冰敷与医疗润滑剂协助才将戒指移除。

Daniel stated: "My Galaxy Ring battery started swelling on my finger just as I was about to board, the ring couldn't be removed and was very painful." Daniel 表示：「我的 Galaxy Ring 电池在手指上开始鼓胀，当时我正要登机，戒指无法取下并且非常疼痛。」

He added that the accident led to him being denied boarding, having to pay extra hotel fees, and delaying his return journey. Daniel captioned the picture: 'You can see the battery is completely swollen. Never wearing a smart ring again.' 他补充称，事故导致其被拒绝登机，不得不额外支付酒店费用，并推迟返程。Daniel 配图称：「你能看到电池全部鼓胀了。再也不戴智能戒指了。」

According to his speculation, possible reasons include 'Hawaii's high temperatures, saltwater exposure, continuous flights,' and 'a defect in the battery itself.' 据其推测，可能的原因包括「夏威夷的高温、盐水接触、连续乘机」以及「电池本身存在缺陷」。

He also pointed out that the device's battery life performance had been poor for the past few months. 他还指出，过去数月该设备的续航表现一直不佳。

Currently, Samsung has not yet made a public response regarding this incident. 目前，三星方面尚未就此事件作出公开回应。

Daniel emphasized: 'Any device with a battery that needs to be worn close to the body should be designed to be very easy to remove, in case the battery swells.' Daniel 强调：「任何带电池且需要贴身佩戴的设备，都应该设计得非常容易取下，以防电池膨胀。」

item.title: 谷歌更新「G」Logo，采用更亮渐变色设计
item.guid: 谷歌更新「G」Logo，采用更亮渐变色设计
item.description:
Recently, Google announced an update to its iconic 'G' icon, adopting a brighter four-color gradient design. 日前，谷歌宣布对其标志性「G」图标进行更新，启用更亮的四色渐变设计。

The official statement said that this design was initially applied to search services earlier this year and will now be extended to all products and platforms across the company. 官方表示，这一设计最初在今年早些时候应用于搜索服务，如今将扩展至公司范围内的所有产品与平台。

Google stated that while maintaining the classic four colors, the new icon, through a more distinct gradient effect, symbolizes the innovative vitality and creative energy of the AI era. 谷歌称，新图标在保持经典四色的同时，通过更鲜明的渐变效果，象征 AI 时代的创新活力与创造能量。

Previously, this design was first applied to Gemini-related products and will be gradually rolled out to more services in the coming months. 此前，这一设计已率先应用于 Gemini 相关产品，未来数月将逐步推广至更多服务。

item.title: 营收约 43 亿美元，OpenAI 上半年财报披露
item.guid: 营收约-43-亿美元，OpenAI-上半年财报披露
item.description:
According to The Information, OpenAI achieved approximately $4.3 billion in revenue in the first half of 2025, an increase of 16% year-on-year, surpassing its full-year revenue from last year. 据 The Information 报道，OpenAI 在 2025 年上半年实现营收约 43 亿美元，同比增加 16%，已超过去年全年水平。

The report pointed out that OpenAI's R&D and operational investments during the same period amounted to $6.7 billion, including the costs of large-scale training and running ChatGPT, resulting in a cash burn of approximately $2.5 billion. 报道指出，OpenAI 在同期的研发与运营投入高达 67 亿美元，其中包括大规模训练与运行 ChatGPT 的成本，导致现金消耗约 25 亿美元。

As of the end of the first half, OpenAI held approximately $17.5 billion in cash and securities. The company expects full-year revenue to reach $13 billion and aims to keep cash burn within $8.5 billion. 截至上半年末，OpenAI 持有约 175 亿美元现金与证券。公司预计全年营收可达 130 亿美元，并将现金消耗控制在 85 亿美元以内。

Additionally, sources say Nvidia plans to invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI and provide data center chip support. Earlier reports indicated that OpenAI is also considering an employee stock sale, with a potential valuation of up to $500 billion. 此外，消息称 Nvidia 计划向 OpenAI 投资最高 1000 亿美元，并提供数据中心芯片支持。此前有报道称，OpenAI 还在考虑进行员工股权出售，潜在估值或达 5000 亿美元。

item.title: 得力集团就「跛脚员工入职当天被辞退」事件致歉
item.guid: 得力集团就「跛脚员工入职当天被辞退」事件致歉
item.description:
Deli Group yesterday issued an apology statement, responding to the widely discussed online incident of 'being dismissed on the first day of employment due to a limp.' 得力集团昨天发布致歉声明，回应网络热议的「因跛脚入职当天被辞退」事件。

The company stated that after verification by a special task force, the employee's reported situation was largely true. 公司表示，经专项小组调查核实，该员工反映的情况基本属实。

The Group's Executive President immediately apologized to the individual concerned and arranged for the Head of the President's Office to communicate directly. This morning, personnel were dispatched to the individual's location, hoping to express apologies in person. 集团执行总裁已第一时间向当事人致歉，并安排总裁办主任直接沟通，今日上午更派人飞往当事人所在地，期望当面表达歉意。

The statement pointed out that this incident exposed the company's shortcomings in practicing its values and internal management mechanisms. To address this, Deli Group announced three corrective measures: 声明指出，此次事件暴露了公司在价值观践行与内部管理机制上的不足。为此，得力集团宣布将采取三项整改措施：

    Hold the personnel involved accountable in accordance with rules and regulations;

    Comprehensively review human resource management processes to eliminate any potential discriminatory or hidden standards;

    Strengthen anti-discrimination training for all employees, improve management systems, and ensure the implementation of cultural values.

Deli Group emphasized that it will implement rectifications with the strictest standards, continuously optimize its human resource management mechanism, and firmly adhere to the "people-oriented" employment philosophy. 得力集团强调，将以最严格的标准落实整改，持续优化人力资源管理机制，坚定贯彻「以人为本」的用人理念。

item.title: 法拉第未来总部子办公楼失火，官方回应：与量产车无关
item.guid: 法拉第未来总部子办公楼失火，官方回应：与量产车无关
item.description:
Yesterday, Faraday Future officially published an article on Weibo stating that in the early morning of September 28th, Pacific Time, a fire broke out in a sub-office building at Faraday Future's US headquarters. 昨天，法拉第未来官方在微博发表文章称，美西时间 9 月 28 日凌晨，Faraday Future 美国总部一栋子办公楼发生火情。

The company emphasized in its statement that the incident caused no casualties, and headquarters operations are normal. 公司在说明中强调，此次事件未造成人员伤亡，总部运营一切正常。

The official disclosure includes: 官方披露的情况包括：

    The ignition point was an FF 91 display vehicle inside the building; the office building's walls sustained minor damage, and the glass remained intact;

    Preliminary findings rule out the possibility of battery pack ignition or explosion; the most probable cause is a short circuit in the showroom's electrical system or poor contact in the 12V low-voltage wiring;

    The vehicle involved, codenamed B40, is one of the earliest BETA prototypes of the FF 91, having been in use for nearly 9 years. Both its power system and battery pack are early versions, and its interior materials do not meet the flame retardant standards for production vehicles.

The company emphasized that the accident vehicle is completely different from production vehicles and therefore will not trigger a recall of FF 91 production vehicles. 公司强调，事故车辆与量产车完全不同，因此不会引发 FF 91 量产车召回。

The official statement read: "Safety is always the primary requirement. This incident serves as a wake-up call for fire prevention in office areas. The company will complete the final investigation as soon as possible and implement necessary improvement measures." 官方表示：「安全始终是第一要求，此次事故为办公区火灾防范敲响警钟。公司将尽快完成最终调查，并采取必要改进措施。」

item.title: 宇树科技回应机器人安全漏洞：大部分修复已完成
item.guid: 宇树科技回应机器人安全漏洞：大部分修复已完成
item.description:
Media reports indicate that "IEEE Spectrum" recently disclosed critical vulnerabilities in several models of Unitree Robotics robots when configuring Wi-Fi interfaces via BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy), which attackers could exploit to gain root access. 媒体报道指出，「IEEE Spectrum」近日披露多个型号的宇树科技机器人在通过 BLE（蓝牙低能耗）配置 Wi-Fi 接口时存在关键漏洞，攻击者可能借此获取最高权限控制。

In response, Unitree Robotics issued a statement on social media, saying that the company immediately initiated repairs, and most issues have now been resolved, with subsequent updates to be pushed soon. 对此，宇树科技在社交平台发布声明称，公司已第一时间展开修复，目前大部分问题已得到解决，后续更新将很快推送。

Unitree Robotics emphasized that its robot products are designed for offline use by default and do not actively connect to the internet; devices only access the network when manually configured and authorized by the user. 宇树科技强调，其机器人产品在默认情况下设计为离线使用，不会主动连接互联网；只有在用户手动配置并授权时，设备才会接入网络。

Once connected, robots may send basic information such as serial numbers and health status to the server, a mechanism similar to electronic devices like smartphones. 连接后，机器人可能会向服务器发送序列号、健康状态等基础信息，这一机制与智能手机等电子设备类似。

The company also stated that it will continue to optimize its permission management mechanism to reduce potential misunderstandings and enhance user safety experience. 公司同时表示，将持续优化权限管理机制，以减少潜在误解并提升用户安全体验。

item.title: 理想汽车推出 i6 跨年购置税兜底方案
item.guid: 理想汽车推出-i6-跨年购置税兜底方案
item.description:
Li Auto announced yesterday that, to address user concerns about potential changes in purchase tax policies due to year-end deliveries, it has officially launched the "Li Auto i6 Year-End Purchase Tax Subsidy Program," accompanied by the slogan "Guaranteed, buy with confidence!" 理想汽车昨天宣布，为应对用户对跨年交付可能带来购置税政策变动的担忧，正式推出「理想 i6 跨年购置税补贴方案」，并配文「有兜底，放心买！」。

According to the official introduction, users who complete their order lock by October 31, 2025, and whose invoicing and delivery must be completed in 2026 due to Li Auto's reasons, will be eligible for a year-end purchase tax subsidy. 根据官方介绍，凡在 2025 年 10 月 31 日前完成锁单的用户，如因理想汽车原因需在 2026 年完成开票交付，将可享受跨年购置税补贴。

The subsidy will be in the form of a cash reduction on the final payment, with the amount offsetting the corresponding purchase tax difference based on the vehicle configuration, ensuring users do not bear additional purchase tax expenses. 补贴方式为尾款现金减免，金额将根据购车配置抵减相应购置税差额，以确保用户无需额外承担购置税支出。

Additionally, the Li Auto i6 also offers first-sale benefits worth up to 35,000 yuan, specifically including: 同时，理想 i6 还提供最高价值 35,000 元的首销权益，具体包括：

    Cash reduction of 10,000 yuan;

    Free gift of dual-chamber magic carpet air suspension worth 15,000 yuan;

    A smart hot and cold dual-use refrigerator worth 5,000 yuan is given away for free;

    A full-car silent electric suction door worth 5,000 yuan is given away for free.

It should be noted that users can modify the configuration or apply for a refund within 7 days after paying the deposit. After 7 days, orders cannot be modified or canceled, and the deposit is non-refundable. 需要注意的是，用户在支付定金后 7 天内可修改配置或申请退款，7 天后订单将无法修改或取消，且定金不可退。

Li Auto stated that the current order volume for the i6 has exceeded expectations, and the company is working hard to increase production capacity and shorten delivery waiting times, allowing users to pick up their cars as early as possible. 理想方面表示，目前 i6 订单量已超出预期，公司正全力提升产能，缩短交付等待时间，让用户尽早提车。

item.title: 💡 福特 CEO 警告：美国 AI 发展掩盖「蓝领危机」
item.guid: 💡-福特-CEO-警告：美国-AI-发展掩盖「蓝领危机」
item.description:
According to The Verge, in a recent interview, Ford CEO Jim Farley mentioned that while American society is buzzing about AI boosting white-collar productivity, it overlooks the severe shortage of manufacturing and essential jobs. 据 The Verge 报道，在最新访谈中，福特 CEO 吉姆·法利提到，美国社会在热议 AI 提升白领生产力的同时，却忽视了制造业和基础岗位的严重短缺。

He pointed out that the U.S. currently has a shortage of over 500,000 manufacturing workers and 500,000 construction workers, and "foundational economy" jobs such as emergency services, firefighting, healthcare, and skilled trades also face a crisis. 他指出，美国目前存在超过 50 万制造业工人和 50 万建筑工人的缺口，急救、消防、医疗、技工等「基础经济」岗位同样面临危机。

Farley emphasized that AI tools are rapidly changing the efficiency of office work, but blue-collar jobs have not received the same technological support and training resources, stating, "White-collar workers have AI, but blue-collar workers do not." 法利强调，AI 工具正在快速改变办公室工作的效率，但蓝领岗位并未获得同等的技术支持和培训资源，「白领有了 AI，而蓝领没有」。

He warned that this imbalance poses a greater threat to society's sustainable development than AI itself. 他警告，这种失衡比 AI 本身更威胁社会的可持续发展。

To address this challenge, Ford has invested $1 billion to improve factory environments and promote skilled trades training and scholarship programs. 为应对这一挑战，福特已投入 10 亿美元改善工厂环境，并推动技工培训和奖学金计划。

Farley called on society to re-recognize the importance of the "foundational economy" and rebuild respect and support for blue-collar professions, stating, "We must invest resources to improve the productivity of blue-collar jobs, just as we focus on AI." 法利呼吁社会重新认识「基础经济」的重要性，重建对蓝领职业的尊重与支持，「我们必须像关注 AI 一样，投入资源提升蓝领岗位的生产力」。

item.title: 全尺寸人形机器人 Oli 成为「赛博球童」：自主完成捡球与深蹲动作
item.guid: 全尺寸人形机器人-Oli-成为「赛博球童」：自主完成捡球与深蹲动作
item.description:
Recently, the full-size humanoid robot Oli demonstrated its new "cyber caddy" capabilities. The robot can autonomously perform actions such as tennis ball recognition, tracking, picking up, and placing, while also achieving complex postures like walking, bending, and deep squatting. 近日，全尺寸人形机器人 Oli 展示了「赛博球童」的全新能力。该机器人能够全自主完成网球识别、跟踪、捡球、放置等动作，并在过程中实现行走、弯腰、深蹲等复杂姿态。

Oli is based on Whole-Body Loco-Manipulation with Active Perception, requiring no motion capture data or remote control, completing the entire process autonomously. Oli 基于主动感知的全身移动操作（Whole-Body Loco-Manipulation with Active Perception），无需动捕数据，也不依赖远程操控，整个流程完全自主完成。

According to reports, Oli is 1.65 meters tall and has a total of 43 degrees of freedom, with 31 in the body and 12 in the dexterous hands. Its dual hands can track objects up to 2 meters vertically and 1.8 meters horizontally. 据介绍，Oli 身高 1 米 65，全身共 43 个自由度，其中身体 31 个、灵巧手 12 个。其双手的跟踪范围可覆盖纵向最高 2 米、横向最长 1.8 米。

Notably, Oli's squatting motion is stable and natural, and the operation process is smooth, quite similar to the recent clip of Neo squatting to pick up clothes in Speed's 1X live stream. 值得注意的是，Oli 的下蹲动作稳定自然，操作过程流畅，与近期 Speed 的 1X 直播中 Neo 蹲下捡衣服的片段颇为相似。

Both full-size humanoid robots demonstrated coordination when performing deep squats and reaching forward with their arms, actions that are highly challenging for long-legged humanoid robots. 两款全尺寸人形机器人均展现了在深蹲并向前伸臂操作时的协调性，这类动作对大长腿人形机器人而言极具挑战。

item.title: 索尼发布 1 亿像素 100 fps 全域快门传感器
item.guid: 索尼发布-1-亿像素-100-fps-全域快门传感器
item.description:
According to PetaPixel, Sony Semiconductor officially released the new generation high-performance image sensor IMX927. 据 PetaPixel 报道，索尼半导体正式发布新一代高性能图像传感器 IMX927。

This is a back-illuminated stacked CMOS sensor, featuring a global shutter design, approximately 105 million pixels resolution, and supporting high-speed output up to 100 frames/second. 这是一款背照式堆栈 CMOS 传感器，采用全局快门设计，具备约 1.05 亿像素分辨率，并支持最高 100 帧/秒的高速输出。

According to reports, the IMX927 sensor has a diagonal size of 39.7mm, close to full-frame specifications. 据介绍，IMX927 传感器对角线尺寸为 39.7mm，接近全画幅规格。

Its core features Sony's self-developed Pregius S global shutter technology, achieving high-speed, low-power data processing by optimizing pixel readout and A/D converters. 其核心搭载索尼自研的 Pregius S 全局快门技术，通过优化像素读取与 A/D 转换器，实现高速低功耗的数据处理。

Sony stated: "This combination of high resolution and high frame rate will help improve productivity in the industrial equipment sector and meet increasingly diverse recognition and detection needs." 索尼表示：「这一高分辨率与高帧率的组合，将有助于提升工业设备领域的生产力，满足日益多样化的识别与检测需求。」

The IMX927 series features a new ceramic package, built-in standardized connectors, and supports various interface forms, making it easy for camera manufacturers to quickly integrate it into their designs. IMX927 系列采用全新陶瓷封装，内置标准化连接器，支持多种接口形式，方便相机厂商在设计中快速集成。

A total of 16 products have been launched in this series, all featuring a detachable design for easy sensor replacement based on application scenarios. 该系列共推出 16 款产品，均具备可拆卸设计，便于根据应用场景更换传感器。

In terms of specifications, the IMX927 supports 8/10/12-bit output modes, corresponding to shooting speeds of 112, 102, and 73 frames/second, respectively. 在规格方面，IMX927 支持 8/10/12 位输出模式，分别对应 112、102 和 73 帧/秒的拍摄速度。

The sensor outputs a square image with a resolution of 10,272 × 10,272 pixels and supports various pixel binning modes to balance sensitivity and speed. 传感器输出画幅为 10,272 × 10,272 像素的正方形图像，并支持多种像素合并模式，以兼顾灵敏度与速度。

Sony emphasizes that this sensor is not only suitable for high-precision inspection scenarios such as semiconductors and panels but also provides distortion-free, low-noise, high-resolution images for large-sized object imaging, thereby promoting higher precision measurement and inspection in more industrial applications for machine vision cameras. 索尼强调，该传感器不仅适用于半导体、面板等高精度检测场景，也能在大尺寸物体成像中提供无畸变、低噪声的高分辨率画面，从而推动机器视觉相机在更多工业应用中实现更高精度的测量与检测。

item.title: 699.3 元，Nothing CMF 推出新款头戴式耳机

item.title: 豆包大模型 1.6-vision 发布：多模态能力全面升级，支持图像生成
item.guid: 豆包大模型-1.6-vision-发布：多模态能力全面升级，支持图像生成
item.description:
Yesterday, Volcengine officially launched "Doubao Large Model 1.6-vision," focusing on multimodal understanding and generation capabilities, and is now open for trial application on its official website. 昨天，火山引擎正式推出「豆包大模型 1.6-vision」，主打多模态理解与生成能力，已在官网开放申请试用。

According to reports, "1.6-vision" possesses capabilities such as image generation, image Q&A, and image understanding. It supports uploading images for tasks like content recognition, scene analysis, and image-text mixed reasoning, making it suitable for various scenarios including e-commerce, education, and social media. 据介绍，「1.6-vision」具备图像生成、图像问答、图像理解等能力，支持上传图片进行内容识别、场景分析、图文混合推理等任务，适用于电商、教育、社交等多种场景。

Volcengine stated that the new version introduces "text-to-image" capability in image generation, supporting text input to generate images, adaptable to various styles and sizes, and allowing content control through prompts. 火山引擎表示，新版本在图像生成方面引入了「文生图」能力，支持输入文本生成图片，适配多种风格与尺寸，并可结合提示词进行内容控制。

Furthermore, "1.6-vision" has upgraded its image Q&A capabilities, enabling it to recognize complex elements such as objects, text, tables, and maps in images. It supports multi-turn conversations and context understanding, improving the accuracy and stability of cross-modal reasoning. 此外，「1.6-vision」还升级了图像问答能力，可识别图中物体、文字、表格、地图等复杂元素，支持多轮对话与上下文理解，提升了跨模态推理的准确性与稳定性。

Currently, the Doubao Large Model has opened API access, supporting multimodal inputs such as text and images. Enterprise users can apply for a trial through the Volcengine official website. 目前，豆包大模型已开放 API 接入，支持文本、图像等多模态输入，企业用户可通过火山引擎官网申请试用。

item.title: 智谱 GLM-4.6 正式上线：代码能力对齐国际顶尖模型
item.guid: 智谱-GLM-4.6-正式上线：代码能力对齐国际顶尖模型
item.description:
Yesterday, Zhipu announced the official launch of its flagship large model, GLM-4.6. 昨天，智谱宣布旗下旗舰大模型 GLM-4.6 正式上线。

According to reports, as the latest version of the GLM series, the model has achieved comprehensive upgrades in areas such as code programming, long context processing, reasoning and search, and writing capabilities. 据介绍，作为 GLM 系列的最新版本，该模型在代码编程、长上下文处理、推理与搜索、写作能力等方面实现全面升级。

Official data shows that GLM-4.6's coding ability has improved by 27% compared to the previous generation GLM-4.5, and it has aligned with 'Claude Sonnet 4' in real programming tasks, becoming the strongest known coding model in China. 官方数据显示，GLM-4.6 的代码能力较上一代 GLM-4.5 提升 27%，在真实编程任务中已对齐「Claude Sonnet 4」，成为国内已知最强的 Coding 模型。

In terms of context processing, GLM-4.6 extends the window length from 128K to 200K, better adapting to complex code and agent tasks. 在上下文处理方面，GLM-4.6 将窗口长度从 128K 扩展至 200K，更好适配复杂代码与智能体任务。

It is worth noting that GLM-4.6 has achieved FP8+Int4 hybrid quantization deployment on Cambricon chips and runs stably on Moore Threads' new generation GPUs based on native FP8 precision. This means that domestic chips have taken a crucial step in localized inference for large models. 值得注意的是，GLM-4.6 已在寒武纪芯片上实现 FP8+Int4 混合量化部署，并在摩尔线程新一代 GPU 上基于原生 FP8 精度稳定运行。这意味着国产芯片在大模型本地化推理上迈出关键一步。

In terms of evaluation, GLM-4.6 performed outstandingly in 8 major authoritative benchmarks such as AIME 25 and SWE-Bench Verified, with some results aligning with 'Claude Sonnet 4/4.5', securing its position as the top domestic model. 在评测方面，GLM-4.6 在 AIME 25、SWE-Bench Verified 等 8 大权威基准中表现突出，部分成绩对齐「Claude Sonnet 4/4.5」，稳居国产模型首位。

Currently, GLM-4.6 is fully launched on bigmodel.cn, z.ai, and Zhipu Qingyan. Overseas users can use the API via z.ai, and the model will be open-sourced on Hugging Face and ModelScope in due course. 目前，GLM-4.6 已在 bigmodel.cn、z.ai 及智谱清言全面上线，海外用户可通过 z.ai 使用 API，模型也将陆续在 Hugging Face 与 ModelScope 开源。

item.title: 百灵团队发布万亿规模思考模型，推理能力显著提升
item.guid: 百灵团队发布万亿规模思考模型，推理能力显著提升
item.description:
Yesterday, the Bailing large model team announced the official open-sourcing of the inference model 'Ring-1T-preview', built upon the Ling 2.0 family's 1T language foundation. 昨天，百灵大模型团队宣布，基于 Ling 2.0 家族 1T 语言基座打造的推理模型「Ring-1T-preview」正式开源。

According to reports, the model has already demonstrated strong natural language inference capabilities in the early stages of large-scale reinforcement learning training. 据介绍，该模型在大规模强化学习训练的早期阶段，已展现出强大的自然语言推理能力。

'Ring-1T' achieved a score of 92.6 in AIME 2025 (American Invitational Mathematics Examination) solely through natural language inference, approaching the 94.6 score level of GPT-5 with thinking (no tools). 「Ring-1T」在 AIME 2025（美国数学邀请赛）中，仅凭自然语言推理就取得了 92.6 分的成绩，逼近 GPT-5 with thinking（no tools）的 94.6 分水平。

It is reported that 'Ring-1T-preview' continues the efficient MoE architecture of Ling 2.0, completed pre-training on 20T high-quality corpus, and combined with the 'icepop' method, conducted RLVR training on the self-developed efficient reinforcement learning system ASystem. 据悉，「Ring-1T-preview」延续 Ling 2.0 高效 MoE 架构，在 20T 高质量语料上完成预训练，并结合「棒冰（icepop）」方法，在自研高效强化学习系统 ASystem 上进行了 RLVR 训练。

The team stated that although the preview version has demonstrated strong inference capabilities, issues such as language mixing, repetitive reasoning, and identity recognition errors still exist, and continuous optimization will follow. 团队表示，虽然预览版已展现出强大推理能力，但仍存在语种混杂、推理重复、身份认知错误等问题，后续将持续优化。

Currently, 'Ring-1T-preview' is available for download on the Hugging Face platform. The team looks forward to community exploration and feedback to jointly accelerate the iterative improvement of the trillion-parameter base model. 目前，「Ring-1T-preview」已在 Hugging Face 平台开放下载，团队期待社区探索与反馈，共同加速万亿基座模型的迭代完善。

item.title: 国庆假期「纵向单间」卧铺动车引热议，12306 回应：仅夜间运行
item.guid: 国庆假期「纵向单间」卧铺动车引热议，12306-回应：仅夜间运行
item.description:
According to DENSITY FINANCE, as the National Day and Mid-Autumn Festival holidays approach, many travelers have shared their experiences of riding 'longitudinal single-compartment' sleeper high-speed trains on social media, calling them 'mobile hotels,' which has sparked widespread discussion. 据密度财经报道，国庆中秋假期临近，不少旅客在社交平台晒出乘坐「纵向单间」卧铺动车的经历，并称其为「移动宾馆」，引发广泛讨论。

According to 12306 staff, this type of longitudinal sleeper high-speed train has been operating for some time, and there are no special prompts on the ticketing page; the specific situation is subject to the passenger boarding. The staff also stated that these trains operate in a 'depart in the evening, arrive in the morning' mode, running only at night. 据 12306 工作人员介绍，该类纵向卧铺动车已运行一段时间，在购票页面不会有特别提示，具体情况以旅客上车为准。工作人员同时表示，这类列车为「夕发朝至」模式，仅在夜间运行。

Previously, China Railway disclosed that this sleeper high-speed train travels between Beijing West and Shenzhen North, covering a total distance of 2424 kilometers. Around the holidays, additional services will be added to this route, including September 30, October 1, October 2, October 7, and October 8. 此前，中国铁路方面曾披露，该卧铺动车往返北京西与深圳北，全程 2424 公里。在假期前后，该线路将增加车次，包括 9 月 30 日、10 月 1 日、10 月 2 日、10 月 7 日和 10 月 8 日。

Some netizens believe that the single-compartment design effectively avoids interference between strangers and better meets the needs of long-distance overnight travel; others have reported that the longitudinal layout can cause discomfort during high-speed travel. Overall, the experience of this new type of sleeper high-speed train continues to spark discussion. 有网友认为，单间设计有效避免了陌生人之间的干扰，更符合长途夜行需求；也有人反馈纵向布局在高速行驶中容易产生不适感。整体来看，这一新型卧铺动车的体验仍在持续引发讨论。

item.title: icebreaker Touch Lab 重庆万象城店开幕
item.guid: icebreaker-Touch-Lab-重庆万象城店开幕
item.description:
New Zealand Merino wool outdoor brand icebreaker has opened its first store in Chongqing, located on the 1st floor of Chongqing MixC North. 新西兰美丽诺羊毛户外品牌 icebreaker 在重庆开出首店，新店位于重庆万象城北区 1 层。

On the opening day, brand friend and young actor Chen Xinhai, along with several other brand friends, attended to show their support. 开业当天，品牌挚友、青年演员陈鑫海及多位品牌好友到场助阵。

The new store continues icebreaker's consistent visual language and natural aesthetic. A '100% Plastic-Free Journey' themed wall was set up on-site, showcasing steps from natural raw material selection and sustainable production models to the replication of partner farm logos, highlighting the brand's philosophy of 'harmony between humans and nature'. 新店延续了 icebreaker 一贯的视觉语言与自然气质，现场设置「100% 无塑化之旅」主题墙，展示了从天然原料甄选、可持续生产模式，到合作牧场标识复刻等环节，凸显品牌「人与自然和谐共生」的理念。

The store displays a full range of Merino wool products, including classic basics and functional apparel, covering features such as temperature regulation, soft skin-friendliness, odor resistance, lightweight breathability, and machine washability, suitable for year-round wear and various sports scenarios. 店内陈列了全系列美丽诺羊毛产品，包括经典基本款与功能性服饰，覆盖温控调节、柔软亲肤、防臭抑菌、轻盈透气及支持机洗等特性，适合全年穿着及多种运动场景。

During the opening event, Chen Xinhai wore this season's autumn/winter new products – a Merino wool "Wool Shell" jacket and Merino blend stretch outdoor trousers. 开业活动中，陈鑫海身着本季秋冬新品——美丽诺羊毛「毛壳」冲锋衣与美丽诺混纺弹性户外长裤。

According to reports, the "Wool Shell" jacket uses 96.8% natural raw materials, combining Merino wool's tight weaving process with a DWR eco-friendly waterproof membrane, offering windproof, waterproof, and environmentally friendly properties, while also providing a skin-friendly, soft, and anti-static wearing experience. 据介绍，「毛壳」冲锋衣采用 96.8% 天然原料比例，结合美丽诺羊毛紧密编织工艺与 DWR 环保防水膜，兼具防风、防水与环保特性，同时带来亲肤、柔软、防静电的穿着体验。

item.title: 东鹏特饮与炫迈跨界联名推出无糖口香糖
item.guid: 东鹏特饮与炫迈跨界联名推出无糖口香糖
item.description:
According to Foodaily information, recently, Dongpeng Special Drink and Mondelez's Stride announced a cross-industry collaboration, officially launching Dongpeng Special Drink flavored sugar-free chewing gum. 据小食代信息，日前， 东鹏特饮与亿滋旗下的炫迈宣布达成跨界合作，正式推出东鹏特饮风味无糖口香糖。

This marks the first time both parties have broken category boundaries, integrating energy drinks with chewing gum, aiming to bring consumers a new flavor experience and mental boost. 这是双方首次打破品类界限，将能量饮料与口香糖进行融合，旨在为消费者带来全新的风味体验与精神提振效果。

According to reports, this co-branded product combines the classic flavor of Dongpeng Special Drink with Stride's mint factor, creating a double "BUFF". 据介绍，这款联名产品融合了东鹏特饮的经典风味与炫迈的薄荷因子，形成双重「BUFF」。

One side focuses on "refreshing when drunk," while the other emphasizes "exciting when chewed." Both parties hope to create a "high-energy companion" for young people's daily lives through this combination. 一方主打「喝得提神」，另一方强调「嚼得带感」，双方希望通过这种组合，打造出年轻人日常生活中的「高能搭子」。

Dongpeng Special Drink stated that both teams spent several months, from flavor research and development, taste refinement, to packaging design and marketing planning, meticulously overseeing each step to finally complete this innovative product. 东鹏特饮方面表示，双方团队历经数月，从风味研发、口感打磨到包装设计与营销规划，层层把关，最终完成了这款创新产品。

The co-branded chewing gum will be launched nationwide and promoted through a combination of online and offline multi-channels. 联名口香糖将面向全国市场发售，并通过线上线下多渠道联合推广。

Nielsen data shows that Dongpeng Special Drink's sales share reached 47.9% in 2024, maintaining its position as number one in China's energy drink market for four consecutive years. 尼尔森数据显示，东鹏特饮 2024 年销量占比达 47.9%，连续四年稳居中国能量饮料市场第一。

Through this collaboration, Dongpeng Special Drink hopes to integrate into younger consumer groups in a lighter way, while Stride is expected to expand its audience by leveraging Dongpeng Special Drink's channels and user base. 借助此次联名，东鹏特饮希望以更轻盈的方式融入年轻消费群体，而炫迈则有望借助东鹏特饮的渠道与用户基础实现人群破圈。

item.title: 索尼与锐步推出 PlayStation 30 周年联名鞋款
item.guid: 索尼与锐步推出-PlayStation-30-周年联名鞋款
item.description:
To celebrate PlayStation's 30th anniversary, Sony and Reebok have teamed up to launch a new co-branded footwear collection. 为庆祝 PlayStation 诞生 30 周年，索尼与锐步携手推出全新联名鞋履系列。

This collaboration is inspired by classic 90s game consoles, with three shoe models to be released in limited quantities in the United States, United Kingdom, and Japan, each region featuring unique design elements. 此次合作以 90 年代经典游戏机为灵感，三款鞋型将在美国、英国和日本三地限量发售，每个地区均配备独特设计元素。

    The UK market will see the exclusive release of the Reebok Workout Plus on October 15th at END, offering a dual lacing system and detachable accessories;

    The US market will feature the Reebok Pump Omni Zone II at CNCPTS in New York starting October 17th, equipped with custom PlayStation-colored pump balls and retro details;

    The Japanese market will launch the Reebok Instapump Fury 94 through Beams on October 24th, with a tongue design incorporating "Press Play" elements, paying homage to the classic 1994 console.

All three shoes feature grey uppers, echoing the iconic color scheme of the original PlayStation, and are adorned with classic button symbols on the tongue and heel. This collaboration is seen as a cross-over integration of gaming and sports fashion culture. 三款鞋均采用灰色鞋面，呼应初代 PlayStation 的标志性配色，并在鞋舌与鞋跟处点缀经典按键符号。此次合作被视为游戏与运动潮流文化的跨界融合。

item.title: 《辛普森一家》电影续集定档 2027 年夏季上映
item.guid: 《辛普森一家》电影续集定档-2027-年夏季上映
item.description:
Disney and 20th Century Studios officially announced that "The Simpsons Movie" sequel will hit global cinemas on July 23, 2027. This marks a return exactly 20 years after the first movie's release in 2007. 迪士尼与 20 世纪影业正式宣布，《辛普森一家》电影续集将于 2027 年 7 月 23 日登陆全球院线。这是继 2007 年首部电影上映后，时隔整整 20 年的回归。

Reportedly, the sequel is personally supervised by creator Matt Groening, continuing the series' characteristic satirical humor. 据悉，续集由创作者马特·格勒宁亲自监督制作，延续该系列一贯的讽刺幽默风格。

The film's plot has not yet been revealed, but the official channels released an iconic pink donut poster on social media with the tagline "Homer wants another one," sparking heated discussion among fans. 影片剧情暂未公开，但官方通过社交媒体释出标志性的粉色甜甜圈海报，并配上标语「荷马要再来一次」，引发粉丝热议。

item.title: 《震耳欲聋》发布新预告
item.guid: 《震耳欲聋》发布新预告
item.description:
The film "Deafening" released its "Am I Wrong" trailer today. The film takes the growth experience of "gray area lawyer" Li Qi as its main storyline, deeply revealing the inherent trauma and real-life difficulties brought by the CODA identity. 电影《震耳欲聋》今日发布「我有错吗」预告，影片以「灰度律师」李淇的成长经历为主线，深刻揭示了 CODA 身份带来的原生创伤与现实困境。

The film tells the story of Li Qi, who gradually finds himself at a crossroads of desire and morality after becoming involved in a deaf anti-fraud case. Although he strongly resists any association with his "deaf" identity, he revealed his true feelings after drinking: "From the day I was born, I spoke every day, but no one could hear me." This line deeply resonates, reflecting the complex situation of the CODA community. 影片讲述李淇因卷入聋人反诈案而逐渐走向欲望与道德的十字路口。虽然他极力抗拒与「聋人」身份的关联，却在一次酒后吐露心声：「从我出生那天开始，我每天都说话，没有人听得见。」这一台词直击人心，折射出 CODA 群体的复杂处境。

According to official introductions, the film is partly based on the true experiences of CODA lawyer Zhang Qi. Director Wan Li stated that he hopes to convey the value of "being your own hero" through Li Qi's story, allowing the audience to find resonance and courage in the character's struggles and redemption. 官方介绍称，本片部分取材自 CODA 律师张琪的真实经历。导演万力表示，希望通过李淇的故事传递「做自己的英雄」的价值观，让观众在角色的挣扎与救赎中获得共鸣与勇气。

"Deafening" stars Tan Jianci, Lan Xiya, and Wang Ge, with Wang Yanhui and Chi Peng making special appearances. The film will have nationwide sneak previews from October 2nd to 3rd and officially be released on October 4th. 《震耳欲聋》由檀健次、兰西雅、王戈领衔主演，王砚辉、迟蓬特邀出演，影片将于 10 月 2 日至 3 日进行全国点映，并于 10 月 4 日正式上映。

item.title: 《浪浪人生》今日上映
item.guid: 《浪浪人生》今日上映
item.description:
The film "Drifting Life" officially landed in cinemas nationwide yesterday. 电影《浪浪人生》昨天正式登陆全国院线。

The film is produced by Han Han, directed by Ma Lin, and stars Huang Bo, Fan Chengcheng, and Yin Tao, with Chang Yuan, Li Jiaqi, Liu Xuehua, Fu Hang, and others participating. It tells the story of a family fighting "madly" to protect their home in adversity. 影片由韩寒监制、马林执导，黄渤、范丞丞、殷桃领衔主演，常远、李嘉琦、刘雪华、付航等参演，讲述一家人在逆境中「疯浪」搏命守家的故事。

The film is adapted from Cai Chongda's best-selling book "The Shell," based on real-life stories, and integrates elements of comedy, family, and drama. 影片改编自蔡崇达畅销书《皮囊》，以真人真事为创作基础，融合喜剧、家庭与剧情元素。

During its sneak preview period, the film's reputation continued to rise, with a Maoyan preview score of 9.5 and a Big V recommendation rate as high as 98%. Many viewers commented, "It has both laughter and tears, and the meaning of home is interpreted vividly." 该片点映期间口碑持续走高，猫眼点映评分 9.5，大 V 推荐度高达 98%。不少观众表示「笑点与泪点并存，家的意义被诠释得淋漓尽致」。

Currently, "Drifting Life" is a nationwide hit, coinciding with the National Day and Mid-Autumn Festival holiday period, making it a popular choice for family viewing. 目前，《浪浪人生》正在全国热映中，适逢国庆中秋双节档期，被视为合家欢观影的热门之选。
